question: Who among the following was the Chairman of the Union Constitution Committee of the Constituent Assembly?
explanation:
Chairman of different Committees of Constituent Assembly:
Union Power Committee – Jawaharlal Nehru
Drafting Committee – B R Ambedkar
Flag Committee – J B Kriplani
Fundamental Rights and Minority Committee – Vallabh Bhai Patel
Provincial Constitution Committee – Vallabh Bhai Patel.
Jawaharlal Nehru was the chairman of the Union Constitution Committee.
